markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 2" pfs="Standard">
[See Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=271)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Revelation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=138" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 367 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Bloodline**
[Phoenix](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=15)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 10 minutes
</row>

</column>

---

You can see invisible creatures and objects. They appear to you as translucent shapes, and they are concealed to you.

---
**Heightened (5th)** The spell has a duration of 8 hours.
name: See Invisibility
